channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet

item.title: Fly tipping on street corner, 6th August
item.description:
Significant fly-tipping on this street corner. Please can it be removed ASAP.

item.title: Bin has lost its top and is overflowing, 6th August
item.description:
This bin has lost its top and needs replacing. Also its not getting emptied regularly. Plus we need more bins on this street due to the extra people traffic due to the pub.

Nearest address to the pin placed on the map (from OS Places API): Culford Road, Hackney, London

item.title: Abandoned fridge. The second one in two weeks., 6th August
item.description:
The Scope charity donation bin has been an issue now for a long time. It is located next to Bermondsey Arts Club - 102A Tower Bridge Road SE1 4TP. People leave rubbish outside the bin constantly. I have notified Scope of this issue but they donâ€™t respond.

item.title: Double yellow lines worn out, 6th August
item.description:
Basically people are now parking on either side of Lensbury way particularly at the start of the road as the double yellow lines have worn out. This could present a problem for emergency services trying to access the residents property. Also due to the yellow lines being worn out on the bend it has turned the corner into a blind corner.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Lensbury Way, Lessness Heath, London
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Assortment of black bin bags dumped., 6th August
item.description:
